location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, Currently at Shiraz, to Sir Evan Nepean, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter states that Lieutenant Robert Taylor is proceeding to India with dispatches from the British Ambassador at the Court of Persia [Sir Gore Ouseley] for the Supreme Government. Bruce also states that Taylor is accompanying a Persian officer who is seeking to secure some military stores on behalf of the Persian Government.
